casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Brice Eddie ARTHUR. No. 314P02-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 4, 2004. K.D. Sturgis, Assistant Attorney General, Mitchell D. Norton, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of February 2004 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of March 2004."
